name: TVElementUpdateType
desc: Describes any changes to the DOM tree after it has been reparsed.

items.name: case none
items.desc: The tree structure did not change.

items.name: case subtree
items.desc: A subtree element has been updated without affecting the order of any immediate children.

items.name: case children
items.desc: The order of child nodes have been updated due to the addition, removal, or replacement of child nodes.

items.name: case node
items.desc: The current node and its subtree have been modified.
